detail_desc: Pyjamas with a shirt and pair of shorts in soft satin. Shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide cuffs. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.

Single-breasted jacket in a textured weave made from a cotton blend with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and imitation suede elbow patches. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket with a button. Fastening with two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Ankle-length skirt in jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated waist and a high slit at the front. Partly lined.
Short-sleeved body in stretch ribbed viscose jersey with a low back and lined gusset with press-studs.
Short-sleeved body in stretch ribbed viscose jersey with a low back and lined gusset with press-studs.

Pyjamas in soft jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend. Wide, short-sleeved top with a contrasting colour neckline and a print motif on the front. Short, patterned shorts with an elasticated waist.
Jodhpur boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side, an adjustable tab and metal buckle at the other side, and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2 cm.
Jodhpur boots in imitation suede with a zip in one side, an adjustable tab and metal buckle at the other side, and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2 cm.
Pile-lined biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections on the shoulders and at the back of the hem. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and zipped side pockets.

Long-sleeved dress with a sewn-in bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey and a tulle skirt. Bodysuit with a scalloped neckline and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Skirt with shimmering spots and a sewn-on bow.
Bodysuit dress in soft cotton jersey with a collar and skirt in pleated velour. Long sleeves, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and press-studs at the crotch.

Soft velour ballet shoes with a matching elastic hairband. Shoes with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at one side.Cotton jersey linings and insoles and soft velour soles. Hairband decorated with a large, glittery fabric flower.

Set with a bodysuit in jersey and trousers in velour made from an organic cotton blend. Long-sleeved bodysuit with a collar, shirt front, sewn-on bow tie, button placket and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with side stripes and wide ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with side stripes and wide ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with side stripes and wide ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.

Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front and hood with embroidery and appliqués at the top. Kangaroo pockets, long, printed raglan sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Loafers in imitation patent leather with a strap and tassels at the front. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and smooth soles. Heel 2.5 cm.

Court shoes in imitation leather with pointed toes, covered heels and long ankle ties. Imitation leather linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 8 cm.

Boots in stretch jersey with a sheen. Thigh-high shaft that is elasticated at the top, open toes and imitation leather insoles. Heel 9 cm.
